name: floatmul
notes: This function is rather redundant, for it is no different than the conventional multiplication operator (*).
description: Multiplies two floats with each other.

params_body.name: oper2
params_body.description: Second Float, the first one gets multiplied with.

return_values: The product of the two given floats
related_fn:
Floatadd: Adds two floats.
 Floatsub: Subtracts two floats.
 Floatdiv: Divides a float by another.
